## ItemFieldDefinition.maxOccurs property

Maximum occurrence of the field.

The maximum occurrence specifies the maximum number of values that field may have. Typical occurrence values are 1 (single valued field) and -1 (multi valued field).

**Signature:**

```typescript
get maxOccurs(): number;
```
